center.name: Animal Rescue Network / Reseau Secours Animal

desc:
Baba is a very young male all in smoothness, charming and very very affectionate. He's been only in the shelter for a few months. Baba hopes to be adopted by someone he will be able to follow everywhere in his new home and also seduce all the visitors without discrimination.

name: Baba

center.name: Animal Rescue Network / Reseau Secours Animal

desc:
Here's the very delicate and splendid Peaches. Her name suits her well since her face, her fur, but especially her character has the softness of a peach. Indeed, rarely we saw a little, delicate and affectionate cat like her. She will follow you everywhere in the house, will lie down on the couch beside you and will sleep at the end of your bed. Perhaps, she missed food when she was a baby or it's simply in her genes, but we think that she will remain a small size . Do'nt think that she's weak: you should see her playing and running vigorously.

name: Peaches

desc: Very sweet girl. Still likes to play so would love a playmate, but would do fine by herself. Likes dogs and kids.
name: Spunky

desc: Cody is a sweet neutered male who is up to date on Rabies, Distempter and Bordetella.
name: Cody
